metadata.title: Grimdark Expy
metadata.author: Limrix
metadata.description:
# Grimdark-Expy Definitely NOT one of those other ones
## Crew Equipment Add some pizzaz with over 20 items to play with in a new menu tab.
Thanks to Nai for help with equipment icons!
### Requirements: [Brightness Particles](https://ftlmultiverse.boards.net/thread/109/library-brightness-particles) 1.4+ [Lightweight Lua](https://github.com/neopryne/lightweight-lua) 0.8+
